scripts.start: npm run sync-env && concurrently "npm run start:frontend" "npm run start:backend"
scripts.install: concurrently "cd frontend && npm install" "cd backend && npm install"
scripts.rebuild-db: npm run sync-docker-env && docker-compose -f deployment/docker/compose/docker-compose.yml run --rm db-rebuild
scripts.sync-all-env: npm run sync-env && npm run sync-docker-env
scripts.deploy: npm run sync-docker-env && cd deployment/aws && cdk deploy --app 'npx ts-node --prefer-ts-exts bin/pulseplus.ts'
scripts.deploy:all: npm run push-images && npm run deploy
scripts.docker:up: npm run sync-docker-env && npm run docker -- up --build
scripts.docker:up:detach: npm run sync-docker-env && npm run docker -- up -d --build
scripts.docker:up:fresh: npm run docker:build && npm run docker:up
scripts.docker:up:fresh:detach: npm run docker:build && npm run docker:up:detach
scripts.docker:build: npm run sync-docker-env && npm run docker -- build --no-cache
scripts.docker:build:cached: npm run sync-docker-env && npm run docker -- build
scripts.docker:restart: npm run docker:down && npm run docker:up:fresh
scripts.docker:restart:detach: npm run docker:down && npm run docker:up:fresh:detach
scripts.docs:deploy: npm run docs:build && npm run docs:export
scripts.docs:docker:push: npm run docs:docker:build && docker tag pulseplus-docs:latest ${ECR_REPO}/pulseplus-docs:latest && docker push ${ECR_REPO}/pulseplus-docs:latest
scripts.precommit: npm run lint && npm run security:scan:snyk --report-only
